downloadDescription: These are the Windows 10 IoT Core Packages that enable the user to build a Windows 10 IoT Core runtime image.
detailsSection: These are the Windows 10 IoT Core Packages that enable the user to build a Windows 10 IoT Core runtime image. Windows 10 IoT Core is an edition of Windows 10 designed for building smart things that’s optimized for cost, resources and is available at no cost for all device makers. It’s built to power intelligent edge devices with either no displays like IoT gateways or with displays such as micro-kiosks. Learn more about Windows 10 IoT Core here.
systemRequirementsSection: Operating system • Windows 10 (Build 10140 or higher) Learn about other system requirements here.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save to save this program to disk.
